Target duration in seconds
Total detune span in cents
Dry signal mix amount
Number of unison voices
Stereo width multiplier 0..2
Random-phase blend when --phase-engine hybrid (0.0=propagated only, 1.0=random only; default: 0.5).
Convenience preset for ambient extreme stretch (random phase engine, onset-time-credit, transient preserve, conservative staging).
Channel strategy for F0 estimation with --target-f0 (default: mix)
Analyze input and choose a profile automatically (speech/music/percussion/ambient/extreme).
Seconds of audio used when estimating --auto-profile (default: 6.0).
Optional segment size in seconds for long jobs. When >0, processing runs per segment with crossfade assembly.
Allow automatic transform selection when --transform is not explicitly set.
Output bit-depth policy (default: inherit). Ignored when --subtype is set.
Pitch shift in cents (+1200 is one octave up)
Directory used to cache per-segment checkpoint chunks for resume workflows.
Optional checkpoint run identifier (default: hash of input/settings).
Legacy alias: hard clip at +/-1.0 when set
Coherence lock strength in [0,1] (0=off, 1=full lock).

Compander compression ratio (>=1)
Compander expansion ratio (>=1)

Compressor makeup gain in dB
Compressor ratio (>=1)

Enable compressor above threshold dBFS
Alias for --device cpu.
CUDA device index used when --device is auto/cuda (default: 0)
Compute device: auto (prefer CUDA), cpu, or cuda
Dither policy before quantized writes (default: none)
Deterministic RNG seed for dithering (default: random seed)
Resolve settings without writing files
Print copy-paste example command(s) and exit.
Expander attack time in ms
Expander ratio (>=1)
Expander release time in ms
Enable downward expander below threshold dBFS
Print resolved processing plan JSON and exit without rendering audio.
Auto-mode threshold for multistage activation (default: 2.0).
Force multistage strategy even when ratio is moderate.
Maximum F0 search bound in Hz (default: 1000)
Minimum F0 search bound in Hz (default: 50)
Cepstral lifter cutoff for formant envelope extraction (default: 32)
Max per-bin formant correction gain in dB (default: 12)
Formant correction blend 0..1 when pitch mode is formant-preserving (default: 1.0)
Enable fundamental frame locking. Uses generic short-time Fourier transforms with per-frame FFT sizes locked to detected F0.
Maximum frame FFT size for --fourier-sync (default: 8192)
Minimum frame FFT size for --fourier-sync (default: 256)
Smoothing span (frames) for prescanned F0 track in --fourier-sync (default: 5)
Alias for --device cuda.
Interactive guided mode for first-time users.
Hard clip level in linear full-scale
Hop size in samples (default: 512)
Kaiser window beta parameter used when --window kaiser (default: 14.0)
Peak limiter threshold in linear full-scale
Append entries to an existing --manifest-json file instead of replacing it.
Write processing manifest JSON with per-file settings and outcomes.
Maximum per-stage ratio used in multistage mode (default: 1.8).
Output metadata policy: none, sidecar, or copy (sidecar implementation)
Comma-separated FFT sizes for --multires-fusion (default: 1024,2048,4096)
Blend multiple FFT resolutions for each channel before pitch resampling.
Comma-separated fusion weights for --multires-fusion (defaults to equal weights).
FFT size (default: 2048)
Disable center padding in STFT/ISTFT
Disable fractional read-position realignment on onsets when --onset-time-credit is enabled.
Output normalization mode
Maximum accumulated onset time credit in analysis-frame units (default: 8.0).
Fraction of per-frame read advance removable while onset credit exists (0.0..1.0, default: 0.5).
Enable onset-triggered time-credit scheduling to reduce transient smear during extreme stretching.
Explicit output file path (single-input mode only). Alias: --out
Explicit output file path (single-input mode only). Alias: --out
Directory for output files (default: same directory as each input)
Output format/extension (e.g. wav, flac, aiff). Default: keep input extension.
Overwrite existing outputs
Target peak dBFS when --normalize peak
Phase synthesis engine: propagate (classic phase vocoder), hybrid (propagated + stochastic blend), random (ambient stochastic phase).
Inter-bin phase locking mode for transient fidelity (default: identity)
Optional deterministic seed for random/hybrid phase generation.
Pitch shift in semitones (+12 is one octave up)
Minimum accepted map confidence (default: 0 disables gating).
Shortcut for --pitch-map-stdin (sidechain pitch-follow workflows).
Low-confidence map handling mode (default: hold).
CSV control map for time-varying stretch/pitch. Columns: start_sec,end_sec plus optional stretch,pitch_ratio/pitch_cents/pitch_semitones,confidence. Use '-' to read from stdin.
Crossfade between processed map segments in milliseconds (default: 8.0).
Moving-average smoothing over map pitch ratios in milliseconds.
Read control-map CSV from stdin.
Pitch mode: standard shift or formant-preserving correction (default: standard)
Pitch shift in cents (+1200 is one octave up)
Pitch ratio (>1 up, <1 down). Accepts decimals (1.5), integer ratios (3/2), and expressions (2^(1/12)).
Pitch shift in semitones (+12 is one octave up)
High-level intent preset. Legacy: none/vocal/ambient/extreme. New: default/vocal_studio/drums_safe/extreme_ambient/stereo_coherent.
Named tuning profile for vocoder defaults (default: neutral)
Reduce output and hide status bars
Pitch ratio (>1 up, <1 down). Accepts decimals (1.5), integer ratios (3/2), and expressions (2^(1/12)).
Reference channel index used by --stereo-mode ref_channel_lock (default: 0).
Resampling engine (auto=fft if scipy available, else linear)
Reuse existing checkpoint chunks from --checkpoint-dir when available.
Target RMS dBFS when --normalize rms
Pitch shift in semitones (+12 is one octave up)
Suppress all console output
Soft clip drive amount (>0)
Soft clip output ceiling in linear full-scale
Soft clip transfer type
Write processed audio to stdout stream (for piping); requires exactly one input
Channel coherence strategy: independent (legacy), mid_side_lock (M/S-coupled), ref_channel_lock (phase-lock to reference channel).
Alias for --time-stretch.
Stretch strategy: standard (single pass), multistage (chained moderate passes), or auto (multistage only for extreme ratios; default: auto).
Explicit libsndfile output subtype override (e.g., PCM_16, PCM_24, FLOAT)
Suffix appended to output filename stem (default: _pv)
Absolute target duration in seconds (overrides --time-stretch)
Target fundamental frequency in Hz. Auto-estimates source F0 per file.
Integrated loudness target in LUFS
Pitch shift in semitones (+12 is one octave up)
Output sample rate in Hz (default: keep input rate)
Final duration multiplier (1.0=unchanged, 2.0=2x longer)
Final duration multiplier (1.0=unchanged, 2.0=2x longer)
Per-frame transform backend for STFT/ISTFT paths (default: fft; options: fft, dft, czt, dct, dst, hartley)
Crossfade duration for transient/steady stitching (default: 10 ms).
Transient handling mode: off (none), reset (phase reset), hybrid (PV steady + WSOLA transients), or wsola (time-domain transient-safe path).
Enable transient phase resets based on spectral flux
Transient protection width in milliseconds (default: 30).
Transient detector sensitivity in [0,1] (higher catches more onsets).
Spectral-flux multiplier for transient detection (default: 2.0)
Apply output gain trim to enforce max true-peak in dBTP
Increase verbosity (repeat for extra detail)
Console verbosity level
Window length in samples (default: 2048)
Window type (default: hann)
